def create_alias(alias): """ Creates an alias for the current account. The alias can be used in place of the account ID in the sign-in URL. An account can have only one alias. When a new alias is created, it replaces any existing alias.
:param alias: The alias to assign to the account. """
try: iam.create_account_alias(AccountAlias=alias) logger.info("Created an alias '%s' for your account.", alias) except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't create alias '%s' for your account.", alias) raise
